channel.title: How do you add new player rights?
channel.description: How the fudge do you add new player rights? havnt got the answer for this for 2 years? can someone freakin explain it?!?!!? how do you even declare it... this is for PI

item.title: How do you add new player rights?
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

New player rights are easy, they are already there All you have to do is give them powers, etc. Unless you wanna add a token… then well thats different. IF you want crowns, well, look for the tutorial (cbf to tell you)

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add new player rights?

item.title: How do you add new player rights?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

To make new playerRights, learn the code in the Commands.java and implement it to your new playerRights.

To make a command that gives the new playerRights just find the part of the code c2.playerRights = #; and set it to your playerRights.

To set a crown google for a tutorial and it is client sided in client.java

You guys are over thinking this. It so simple. Just think how playerRights work. They are defined by a certain number. If you make a new number/ playerRights use the new playerRights number to define what you want people with those playerRights to do.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add new player rights?
